name: .YAF File Extension
summary: Learn about .YAF files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use YAF Extractor (Windows) to extract the audio files a YAF file contains. To do so:
Navigate to and open your YAF file.
You can also use YAF Extractor to replace the audio a YAF file contains with custom audio, to customize a WWE SmackDown! Vs. Raw game.
